name: DeepChat
description: A sophisticated, free desktop AI assistant featuring seamless DeepSeek API integration, delivering enterprise-grade conversational intelligence with multi-model support.

content.overview: DeepChat represents the next evolution in desktop AI assistants, offering premium access to DeepSeek's advanced large language models through a sophisticated yet intuitive interface. As a fully open-source application built around DeepSeek's powerful API capabilities, it transforms how users interact with artificial intelligence in their daily workflows.
content.installation: DeepChat can be easily installed by downloading the appropriate package for your operating system from the official GitHub repository. Simply extract the downloaded package and run the installer. The application will guide you through the setup process, including API key configuration for DeepSeek integration.
content.usage: After installation, launch DeepChat and enter your DeepSeek API key in the settings. You can then start new conversations, upload documents for analysis, create custom knowledge bases, and perform real-time internet searches directly within the conversation interface.
